title: Anthrop≈çlogia, or, A philosophic discourse concerning man being the anatomy both of his soul and body : wherein the nature, origin, union, immaterality, immortality, extension, and faculties of the one and the parts, humours, temperaments, complexions, functions, sexes, and ages respecting the other are concisely delineated / by S.H.
author: Haworth, Samuel, fl. 1683.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
